snippet: The Devils’ normally solid defense has shown holes lately, but it has not been a problem because the club’s scoring has increased as well.
abstract: New Jersey Devils’ normally solid defense has shown holes lately, but it has not been a problem because the club’s scoring has increased as well; they have registered eight power-play goals in 26 opportunities since the Olympics, and their defense has even gotten into the act offensively.
lead_paragraph: The Devils’ normally solid defense has shown holes lately, but it has not been a problem because the club’s scoring has increased as well.

headline.main: A Devils Anomaly: Porous Defense, Potent Offense
headline.print_headline: A Devils Anomaly: Porous Defense, Potent Offense
